Farmhouse Fest

June 18, 2016

UBC Farm

One of the most unique beer events in British Columbia returns for a second year. Highlighting farmhouse-style beers in an environment designed for comfortable enjoyment, don’t miss out on this popular summer festival.

Tell Me More

UBC Farm’s spacious natural outdoor setting is an important part of the Farmhouse Fest experience. The working farm has plenty of picnic seating, the nearby UBC Farmer’s Market, and an open, never-crowded environment for the festival.

About the Farm

Featuring Unique and Limited Offerings by Some of the Best Breweries & Importers
